fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check a player each night and restore their sanity, protecting them with Invincible defense for this night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can only be rolled by people that are sane, as deemed by the host. in other words Rasen decides whether or not you are a sane human being
- Once you win you get permission to post images of grapes in <#970059745807437876> until the start of the next game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully protect three people and live until the end of the game.
